name: GB platformer Demo
description:
Control:  Z,  X,  Z+X,  left,  right, up,  down

A GB platformer demo.  you are a warrior with a sword. slay monsters, collect coins and train yourself to fight the Evil King.

This Games is on it early phase of production- Since game development is a time taking process.  An indie developer like me, would require your love and support. your feedback and suggestion would mean a lot!

you can also support my work at  patreon .

This game is free and will be updated weekly with more stories and game mechanics, so let me know what you think in the comment section and stay tuned!

if you like the game and would like to develop further on your own, you can get the project files with a small donation. 

Are you a true warrior?

This game was made in gb studio.  

Bg Image was modified from an another platformer example by vonkykong.
